That's funny, I don't see them being ignored. The Jewish people have their holidays, and are able to take them off as legal holidays. In fact, when my kids were in school, their """"holiday"""" play included Hanukkah and Kwanzaa and their REAL meanings, yet left out the true meaning of Christmas. They only correlated Christmas with Santa and Rudolph. You can go to the store and find things for those religions. But, this has been a primarily Judeau-Christian nation. The courts were decorated with The Ten Commandments and our dollars embellished with In God We Trust. What I do see is an all-out assault on Christianity and anything correlating to Christmas as a Christian holiday. Sad that there are people so offended by the birth of Jesus, the savior, but it was foretold that this would happen. Oh, and for the record, I wouldn't file a complaint if a teacher had a Kwanzaa decoration displayed or if Hindu had one displayed. It doesn't offend me that they choose to practice or celebrate their religion and holidays. My celebration shouldn't offend them.

I agree with your opinion on Clinton, but not with Trump. Trump will wage war and also get the rich richer. It doesn't matter anyway, because our rights will be taken away and we won't have much to live for soon. I'd rather die fighting against this tyrannical and corrupt government who doesn't have the balls to tell the people the truth, that many of the """"conspiracies"""" are true. That officials are being sold out to the richest families in the world. It's the beginning of the end.
